s1.name: Getting the tool-chain
s1.p: The mindc tool-chain is available on the MIND Forge The tool-chain requires a Java virtual machine and use GCC by default to compile C files.

s1.name: Getting the sources
s1.p: You can visit the MIND SVN page for instructions on how to perform a checkout of the sources.
The mindc tool-chain (in trunk/mind-compiler)is built with Maven and is self-contained, which means that you can check it out and build it. See the README.txt file for build instructions.
